org.contentmine.image.ocr

Class HOCRReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.image.ocr.InputReader
      • org.contentmine.image.ocr.HOCRReader

  • public class HOCRReader
extends InputReader
    reads the HTML output from Tesseract and generates SVG including text and boxes.
    Author:
    pm286
